features: All-Around Stretch Waistband: Flexible, stretchy wear for comfy support plus easy on-and-off they can do themselves.
Plant-Based Materials: Made with sustainably harvested, Totally Chlorine-Free fluff pulp
Super Absorbent Protection: Liquid-locking core and secure-fitting moisture-barrier dual layer cuffs help prevent leaks to keep your toddler dry – providing day or night comfort and protection
Big Kid Undie Fit: Super-soft inner and outer layers provide a comfortable plus lightweight feel that your child will love
Convenient Perforated Seams: For speedy and easy changes, easily tear the side seam, remove and toss
body.description: Make the potty-training process a breeze with Honest’s Clean Conscious Training Pants. Featuring a Bio-based core with sustainably harvested fluff pulp, plant-derived materials, and designed to be easy for your toddler to pull on and off - these soft, cozy plus super absorbent must-haves make the transition to the toilet as smooth as possible for everyone. With day or night protection built in and so many adorable prints and styles to choose from, your lil’ one will feel cute, confident plus ready to potty ‘round the clock.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: More Sustainable Our training pants feature a bio-based core made with sustainably harvested, totally Chlorine-Free fluff pulp for a comfort you + your babe can feel good about. Super Absorbent The liquid-locking core and secure-fitting moisture-barrier dual layer cuffs help prevent leaks and long-lasting protection to keep your toddler dry, day or night. Big Kid Undie Feel Our super soft, snug + stretchy all-around waistband provides a comfortable, flexible fit that is easy for your toddler to pull on + off on their own. Honestly Safe These pants are cruelty free and made with bio-based core with sustainably harvested fluff pulp and plant-derived materials. Made without chlorine, parabens, latex or fragrances.
Overnight Baby Diaper Plant-Based, 99% Water Wipes Foaming Bubble Bath 2-in-1 Shampoo + Body Wash Silicone-Free Conditioner Hydrating Face + Body Lotion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs a little small
reviews.reviewText: They run small but they hold up well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the honest company
reviews.reviewText: Really love these pull ups and diapers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter was getting irritation from other pull up diapers, so we switched to the Honest pull up diapers and she hasn’t had any issues. Plus they have super cute prints!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the best for boys
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely loved these diapers when I had my daughter. I would tell everyone who would listen how amazing these diapers are. I had given a bag to my sister for my nephew and she complained of leaks. I didn't know what she was talking about about because I never had any problems with my daughter. However years later, I now have a boy. I usually just bought Huggies because they were cheap. Last month these had an amazing deal so I bought them and to my surprise, almost every time my son pees, they leak. I think maybe because the diapers carry it differently for boys. He is older so I would think he also has higher volumes than say, a newborn. So if you have a girl, I highly recommend. However if you have a boy, have a few back up pairs of pants.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been buying honest, diapers and pull-ups exclusively for my daughter.I have had one Quilty issue through the years in a 3 pack of the training pants. It was with 2 of the packs and it started with a new design and box, so I thought this is the new….But to my delight the 3rd pack was the tried and true perfect fit and dependability, that I look forward to in honest. Theses never leave rashes and severe irritation. It looks slightly like burns like a chemical burn on my child. I have use this brand for I don’t even know how many years I just I’m so thrilled that they continue to make such a high-quality product that doesn’t have chlorine bleach in the lining that burns the bottom of my child practically say goodbye to diaper bomb not saying it’s not needed at times but these cut down on rashes from urine burn

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy worst training pants ever for thick tall african kids
reviews.reviewText: My so is only 1 he's 27 pounds 36 inches already he's on the thicker taller side so I ordered 2 sizes up 3t-4t got the dinosaurs and trucks cause my son Captain loves dinosaurs and trucks these are the worst pull ups I have ever bought there smaller then newborn diapers so tight they turned my sons skin red cutting off his circulation even though they were sized up twice they make them exceedingly extra small idk why huggues are bigger pull ups then these my sons but wouldn't even go in sized up material wouldn't go over his tall legs material is firm hard scratchy it's horrible for what's supposed to be a better alternative plant based high quality pull up for Mt sons sensitive skin this failed him as a toddler and me as a mom it failed us completely only plus is it helps diaper rash heal on its own natural without paste holds pee and blowouts really good for a long time but overall ended up giving these away for free ad Said extremely small fitting keep that in mind if your reading this with a thick tall african toddler do not waste your money or time on these please go look at huggies new leafs they will fit your toddler right and are also plant based I hope this was helpful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just okay, prefer the name brand
reviews.reviewText: Tried these but I’m not very impressed. Quality seems fine, but they do fit a little small even through my daughter is on the lower end of the weight they list. They seem to twist and would probably leak if she were to be peeing more at night. She also finds them less comfortable, always saying something hurts or is scratchy.They’re cute and she does like the graphics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NO LEAKS- NO RASH- HIGHLY FASHIONABLE!
reviews.reviewText: These are the best pull-ups around! Love the quality!
The worst diapers. My daughter leaked every time.
There was not one instance this training pants proved to be useful, even the stool falls out of it when the kid is wearing it.
